REUTERS.TEXT: CORRECTION - TOKYO STOCK EXCHANGE CUTS HOURS In the Tokyo story headlined "TOKYO STOCK EXCHANGE CUTS TRADING HOURS" please read in the second paragraph " ... From 1100 to 1300 ... " instead of " ... From 1115 to 1300 ... " correcting closing time. REUTER
